ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why didn't I log out sooner?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, GMs are good for something after all.  Didn t know about this feature of the game.  Thanks for sharing! ...
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, GMs are good for something after all. Didn't
know about this feature of the game. Thanks for
sharing!

--- Gordon Hughes <ghughes@...> wrote:

> Just
> remember to /report
> <playername> which sends a report to the GMs
> containing the last 10 lines
> of text in your window and follow it up by a
> /petition to explain the reason
> for the /report. The GMs are usually very efficient
> at dealing with these
> idiots. The "but I was roleplaying!" excuse never
> washes with them. ;)
>
> -KS
>
>
